snippet: Douglas G. Rankin, with his reputation for late arrivals, postponements and filibusters, is an example of how defense lawyers often use time as a weapon.
abstract: Douglas G Rankin has earned a reputation within Bronx courthouses as defense lawyer who uses his chronic tardiness and constant postponements and filibusters to extend length of cases; offers example of way in which many defense lawyers use time as a weapon, following proven rule that delays often lead to acquittals (Series: Justice Denied).
lead_paragraph: Douglas G. Rankin, with his reputation for late arrivals, postponements and filibusters, is an example of how defense lawyers often use time as a weapon.

headline.seo: For the Defense, a Master of Delay
headline.main: Courts in Slow Motion, Aided by the Defense
headline.print_headline: Courts in Slow Motion, Aided by the Defense
